page.title: 09LAW AND ORDER
page.content: Luckily for the community, crime is almost unknown in the two viLlages.Over the year there has been a certain amount of teenage vandalism _ for example, several of the ornamental urns in Howick Gardens were overturned and broken and quite recently the graveyard was vandalised. The church was broken into just last year but luckily nothing of great value was taken.The only serious crime in the district still remains unsolved _ a "break in" at Howick Hall;none of the property stolen was recovered. There is a village policeman at Longhoughton and any miscreants are taken to the Magistrates Court at Alnwick.
